When I play this with VLC it crash's after a few frames.  What bothers me more is that included in the leech is QQplayer.  Googling this informs me that many folks have been virused often with this

Why does this old movie got so many leechers?

1mscd2j the reason this "old movie" has so many leechers is because this i the first time it's in HD. It's one of the best movies of the 90s and to see it in HD makes it 100x better.

Oh and you think this is old? I bet you're one of those "if it's not new I don't like it" kind of people... or "eww it's in black and white" people.

pacino and de nero in 1 movie!!!

I don't get it, the official blu-ray site says that release date of BR version of this movies is actually today but this rip was uploaded two weeks ago... how is this possible? Is this really bluray? For me is more like some HDTV from russian or chinese tv + these weird files in torrent...

I'm having trouble playing this on standard players - like Realplayer, etc. While the image is great, the sound is completely out of synch.

Question: Why should I have to download QQPlayer to play this?  Gotta tell you it makes me VERY suspicious of any movie download that won't play on common, widely-used players.

If I cannot find another major, commonly used player to play this on . . .  then I'm deleting the whole, entire file.  I sure as hell ain't gonna take a chance putting some QQPlayer on my computer.  And I'd advise everyone else - if a movie will ONLY play on a special player, DUMP IT.
